custom-meta.meta-value: Relevant data are within the paper and its Supporting Information files. The number of monthly dengue incidence are publicly available at the Epidemiology Unit of Sri Lanka ( http://www.epid.gov.lk/web/index.php?Itemid=448&lang=en&option=com_casesanddeaths). The meteorological data can be obtained from the Computer Division of the Department of Meteorology, Colombo 07 ( info@meteo.gov.lk). Monthly number of dengue incidences and meteorological data are third-party data, and the authors confirm that they did not have any special access to this data which others would not have. All E-gene sequences are available at NCBI database, with the accession numbers for these sequences available within the Supporting Information files.
